main event: A sighting of a circular object observed in Albany, New York on August 31, 1952.
interesting points: The object was reported to be very fast,The sighting had a duration of 13 minutes,The observer used binoculars to view the object,It was noted that the object possibly changed direction during the observation,The report comments that the observation details were sketchy.
witness description: Technical Sergeant John F Skinner, USAF, stationed at Peterson Field
